other_tests.findings: interface dermatitis consistent with erythema multiforme and a mild increase in dermal mucin deposition.
complete dermalâ€“epidermal separation, with a prominent dermal lymphocytic infiltrate and nuclear debris in a background of mucin deposition.
acantholysis at the granular layer of the epidermis; direct immunofluorescence revealed strong intercellular IgG in the stratum corneum.
intraepidermal acantholysis at the subcorneal region; direct immunofluorescence shows intercellular IgG and C3 deposition.
intercellular IgG antibodies and antibodies to desmoglein 1 suggestive of pemphigus foliaceus.
